body: ${1:Zone Name},   ! Name RefList: [ZoneNames, OutFaceEnvNames, ZoneAndZoneListNames, AirflowNetworkNodeAndZoneNames], REQ, #1
autocalculate,   ! Ceiling Height {m}, Def: autocalculate, AC, #8
autocalculate,   ! Floor Area {m2}, Def: autocalculate, AC, #10
,   ! Zone Inside Convection Algorithm [Simple, TARP, CeilingDiffuser, AdaptiveConvectionAlgorithm, TrombeWall], #11
,   ! Zone Outside Convection Algorithm [SimpleCombined, TARP, DOE-2, MoWiTT, AdaptiveConvectionAlgorithm], #12
Yes;   ! Part of Total Floor Area Def: Yes, [Yes, No], #13
Output:Variable,*,Plant Supply Side Cooling Demand Rate,hourly; !- HVAC Average [W]
LowerLeftCorner,  ! Starting Vertex Position [UpperLeftCorner, LowerLeftCorner, UpperRightCorner, LowerRightCorner], REQ, #1
Counterclockwise, ! Vertex Entry Direction [Counterclockwise, Clockwise], REQ, #2
Relative,         ! Daylighting Reference Point Coordinate System Def: Relative, [Relative, World], #4
Relative;         ! Rectangular Surface Coordinate System Def: Relative, [Relative, World], #5
Suburbs   ! Terrain Def: Suburbs, [Country, Suburbs, City, Ocean, Urban], #3
FullExterior,   ! Solar Distribution Def: FullExterior, [MinimalShadowing, FullExterior, FullInteriorAndExterior, FullExteriorWithReflections, FullInteriorAndExteriorWithReflections], #6
25,   ! Maximum Number of Warmup Days Def: 25, #7
1;   ! Minimum Number of Warmup Days Def: 1, #8
,   ! Day of Week for Start Day [Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday], #8
Yes,   ! Use Weather File Holidays and Special Days Def: Yes, [Yes, No], #9
Yes,   ! Use Weather File Daylight Saving Period Def: Yes, [Yes, No], #10
No,   ! Apply Weekend Holiday Rule Def: No, [Yes, No], #11
Yes,   ! Use Weather File Rain Indicators Def: Yes, [Yes, No], #12
Yes,   ! Use Weather File Snow Indicators Def: Yes, [Yes, No], #13
No,   ! Treat Weather as Actual Def: No, [Yes, No], #14
Hour24;   ! First Hour Interpolation Starting Values Def: Hour24, [Hour1, Hour24], #15
